Sentencas: In the present study, SrO doped Yttrium titanate pyrochlore was synthesized using solid state reaction technique.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: The sintering characteristics, crystal structure, thermal and conductivity behavior of doped and undoped pyrochlores have been studied to find their suitability in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: The as-prepared samples were characterized using X-ray diffraction (XRD), Fourier-Transform-Infrared spectroscopy (FT-IR), thermal-gravimetric analysis (TGA) and ac conductivity up to 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: The results are discussed in light of oxygen vacancy formation and structural disordering.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: Undoped and doped yttrium titanate with SrO (x = 0.1) exhibits single Y2Ti2O7 phase with relative density of 94%.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: It was observed that further doping of SrO (x = 0.2-0.4) leads to formation of Y2Ti2O7 phase along with SrTiO3 phase.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: Excessive SrO (x = 0.4) results in increase in ionic conductivity to 1.50 x 10(-1)
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of pure and Sr2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC
